component.name: caffeine-cache
component.title: Caffeine Cache
component.description: The caffeine-cache component is used for integration with Caffeine Cache.
component.label: cache,datagrid,clustering

action.label: producer
action.description: To configure the default cache action. If an action is set in the message header, then the operation from the header takes precedence.

cache.label: producer
cache.description: To configure an already instantiated cache to be used

cacheLoader.label: producer
cacheLoader.description: To configure a CacheLoader in case of a LoadCache use

createCacheIfNotExist.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

evictionType.label: producer
evictionType.description: Set the eviction Type for this cache

expireAfterAccessTime.label: producer
expireAfterAccessTime.description: Set the expire After Access Time in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

expireAfterWriteTime.label: producer
expireAfterWriteTime.description: Set the expire After Access Write in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

initialCapacity.label: producer
initialCapacity.description: Set the initial Capacity for the cache

key.label: producer
key.description: To configure the default action key. If a key is set in the message header, then the key from the header takes precedence.

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

maximumSize.label: producer
maximumSize.description: Set the maximum size for the cache

removalListener.label: producer
removalListener.description: Set a specific removal Listener for the cache

statsCounter.label: producer
statsCounter.description: Set a specific Stats Counter for the cache stats

statsEnabled.label: producer
statsEnabled.description: To enable stats on the cache

basicPropertyBinding.label: advanced
basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

keyType.label: advanced
keyType.description: The cache key type, default java.lang.Object

valueType.label: advanced
valueType.description: The cache value type, default java.lang.Object

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
